exams.title: Graphing & Exponents
exams.description: 20 essential questions covering linear equations, slope, intercepts, and exponent rules - Chapters 3 & 4

exams.title: Exponent Rules Mastery
exams.description: 35 focused questions drilling all critical exponent rules - Product, Quotient, Power, Negative Exponents, and Scientific Notation

exams.title: Ch4 Polynomials - Comprehensive Review
exams.description: 42 questions covering all polynomial topics - identification, operations, and special products

exams.title: Ch4 Polynomials - Advanced Challenge
exams.description: 28 challenging questions focusing on special products and complex multi-step problems

exams.title: Ch5 Factoring - Comprehensive Review
exams.description: 35 questions covering all factoring methods - GCF, grouping, perfect squares, difference of squares, trinomials, and solving quadratics

exams.title: Ch5 Factoring - Advanced Challenge
exams.description: 22 challenging questions focusing on complex factorization, multi-variable problems, and error identification
